body_html: @andydavis1 Sorry, this is failing - I am not exactly sure why, as the gradient computation looks correct (comparing to the python version). I am fairly new to c++ so it's very possible there is something I haven't considered in how these ops are applied. If you have any ideas, happy to poke around!

I am fairly new to c++ so it's very possible there is something I haven't considered in how these ops are applied. If you have any ideas, happy to poke around!
